name: FIREFLY STORM
description:
Light the way to the Jar and Save the Fireflies from the Storm, but be careful not to lose them!

Controls:

W/S keys: Forward/Reverse

A/D keys: Turn Left/Right

How to play:  Fly towards fireflies and take them home to the Jar, Multiple firefly swarms can follow you at any one time. If you get too far from the Fireflies they will seek out other Lights so catch up with them!
